result.reason: The issue involves UI elements (Config and Connection tabs) disappearing when moving the application to a secondary monitor, likely due to improper handling of DPI scaling changes (WM_DPICHANGED) in the DockPanel implementation.
result.approach: Enhance the WM_DPICHANGED handler in FrmMain.cs to explicitly force a layout refresh or save/restore the DockPanel state when the DPI changes, ensuring that docked content is correctly resized and repositioned.
